00007 // File    : glm/gtx/polar_coordinates.inl

00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         template <typename T, precision P>
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> polar
00014         (
00015                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & euclidean
00016         )
00017         {
00018                 T const Length(length(euclidean));
00019                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const tmp(euclidean / Length);
00020                 T const xz_dist(sqrt(tmp.x * tmp.x + tmp.z * tmp.z));
00021 
00022 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00023                 return detail::tvec3<T, P>(
00024                         atan(xz_dist, tmp.y),   // latitude
00025                         atan(tmp.x, tmp.z),             // longitude
00026                         xz_dist);                               // xz distance
00027 #else
00028 #               pragma message("GLM: polar function returning degrees is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00029                 return detail::tvec3<T, P>(
00030                         degrees(atan(xz_dist, tmp.y)),  // latitude
00031                         degrees(atan(tmp.x, tmp.z)),    // longitude
00032                         xz_dist);                                               // xz distance
00033 #endif
00034         }
00035 
00036         template <typename T, precision P>
00037         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> euclidean
00038         (
00039                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & polar
00040         )
00041         {
00042 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00043                 T const latitude(polar.x);
00044                 T const longitude(polar.y);
00045 #else
00046 #               pragma message("GLM: euclidean function taking degrees as parameters is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00047                 T const latitude(radians(polar.x));
00048                 T const longitude(radians(polar.y));
00049 #endif
00050 
00051                 return detail::tvec3<T, P>(
00052                         cos(latitude) * sin(longitude),
00053                         sin(latitude),
00054                         cos(latitude) * cos(longitude));
00055         }
00056 
00057 }//namespace glm
